publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1205 Carolyn Leckie: Identity Cards-That the Parliament is opposed to the introduction of identity cards as a clear attack on the civil liberties of our citizens; pledges that MSPs will not use identity cards in the event of them becoming compulsory, and calls on the people of Scotland to join in a campaign of defiance by refusing to use identity cards.
S2M-1205 Identity Cards (lodged on 26 April 2004) Frances Curran*, Tommy Sheridan*, Colin Fox*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1205 Identity Cards (lodged on 26 April 2004) Patrick Harvie*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1205 Identity Cards (lodged on 26 April 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-1205 Carolyn Leckie: Identity Cards-That the Parliament is opposed to the introduction of identity cards as a clear attack on the civil liberties of our citizens; pledges that MSPs will not use identity cards in the event of them becoming compulsory, and calls on the people of Scotland to join in a campaign of defiance by refusing to use identity cards. Supported by: Frances Curran, Tommy Sheridan, Colin Fox, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Rosie Kane, Patrick Harvie, Chris Ballance, Eleanor Scott, Shiona Baird, Mr Mark Ruskell*
